name: debug-skill

scripts.install-skill: mkdir -p ~/.claude/skills ~/.codex/skills ~/.config/opencode/skill && cp -r debug-skill ~/.claude/skills/debug && cp -r debug-skill ~/.codex/skills/debug && cp -r debug-skill ~/.config/opencode/skill/debug && echo 'Installed to ~/.claude/skills/debug, ~/.codex/skills/debug, ~/.config/opencode/skill/debug'
